idea:
We are early stage start up focusing on women's health. In the first phase, we have started by launching sustainable, eco-conscious menstrual products for women across age groups by adding a unique value addition in all the products either in the product itself, or the packaging, or the social impact the product can bring. For example, our flagship product is India's first anti-microbial cloth pad of India and our disposable pads come with unique leak proof paper disposal bags with red dot. These bags are made up of recycled kraft paper and red dot indicates sanitary waste thereby indicating sanitation workers of the contents inside.

We have introduced India's first period helpline for customers to connect with us on a mobile helpline number via phone call, messages or whatsapp on all their menstrual health related queries, product queries. Our team of experts provide free of charge guidance on range of topics in an unbiased manner.

Also we are building a team of experts like gynecologists, pediatricians, psychologists, dietitians, menstrual health experts, sexual health experts. We will be creating a range of books as illustrations to help people from all age groups girls, women, dads, husbands, brothers answers to commonly held doubts & queries.
name: AVNI CONSUMER CARE PRODUCTS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:

In our 3 years of existence, we have handled a large variety of structure Engineering works now specialize in complex, for instance, PEBs with multiple mezzanines / Floors, multiple roof / floor levels, cranes, canopies etc. â€“ a fact reflected in our completed projects portfolio.

idea:
SPG Medisafe Pvt. Ltd. established in the challenging times of Covid Pandemic, is Medical device manufacturing company based at Taloja-MIDC, Raigad, Maharashtra.

We made a courageous breakthrough in a challenging environment to design & manufacture stone basket and retrievals in the fields of UROLOGY, GASTROENTEROLOGY & GYNECOLOGY of global standards.

SPG Medisafe possesses its own manufacturing unit, an in-house R&D department- Anand Research Centre (ARC) and an excellent network of dealers and distributors along with incredible marketing strategy.
name: SPG MEDISAFE PRIVATE LIMITED
